Texts.Eng: Bring ^orange;Kevin, your overlord^reset; heaps of ^green;Monster Plate^reset;
Texts.Chs: 把^orange;坚硬的怪物金属板^reset;带给^green;凯文^reset;！

Texts.Eng: Can you do me a favor? I need someone to murder like....100 things. I need ^orange;40 Monster Plate^reset; and am far ^green;too lazy^reset; to do it myself. Go on, then. I'll pay.
Texts.Chs: 你可以帮我个小忙吗？我需要雇人帮我杀，呃，杀五百个怪物。我坚硬的怪物金属板，但是我又太懒了，总而言之，我会付给你一大笔钱的！怎样？

Texts.Eng: Thanks. Have this significant sum of money. Also this stupid contract...and this ^red;other thing^reset; I...found. Yea. Found. I'm done with you. Bugger off, little peon.
Texts.Chs: 谢谢，给，这是你应得的报酬，另外我发现这真是一次愚蠢的交易，再见。
